Pleated, calf-length skirt in satin with sequins and beaded embroidery at the front and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined.

Shirt in an airy patterned weave made from a cotton blend with a turn-down collar and French front. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Cropped, straight-cut top in jersey with glittery threads and long sleeves.
Covered metal wire hair decoration with fabric flowers.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Zipped chest pocket, pockets in the side seams, an inner pocket with a press-stud, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.

Jacket in twill containing some wool with a stand-up collar with a tab and press-studs. Zip, flap side pockets with a press-stud and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Slub cotton jersey vest top with a print motif front and back.
Slub cotton jersey vest top with a print motif front and back.

Padded bomber jacket in woven fabric with a ribbed stand-up collar, two-way zip down the front and elastication at the cuffs and hem. Zipped sleeve pocket, side pockets with a concealed press-stud and an inner pocket with a press-stud. Quilted lining. Polyester filling.

Baby Exclusive. Top in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood and concealed press-studs at the top. Kangaroo pocket, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside.

Wide blouse in an airy weave with gathers at the shoulders, a gathered yoke at the back, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Wide blouse in an airy weave with gathers at the shoulders, a gathered yoke at the back, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves.
Sleeveless blouse in a cotton weave with embroidery. Opening and ties at the back of the neck and a frill trim around the neckline and armholes.
Short blouse in a crinkled, textured weave with short puff sleeves and buttons and inset lace trims down the front. Smocking with a frill trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Short blouse in a crinkled, textured weave with short puff sleeves and buttons and inset lace trims down the front. Smocking with a frill trim around the neckline, sleeves and hem. Unlined.
Short skirt in stretch twill with a concealed zip in the side, buttons down the front and small slit at the front. Lined.
Rib-knit hat with an appliqué on the turned-up hem and a faux fur pompoms at the top.
Top in sturdy jersey with balloon sleeves made of poplin. Visible seams, raw edges, wide elastication at the cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Straight-cut, long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with a concealed zip at the back and shoulder pads. Sparkly stone fringes at the back and down the sleeves.

Short wrap dress in airy chiffon with a glittery all-over sequin pattern. V-neck at the front, long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist with a tie and an asymmetric skirt with a flounced hem. Lined.

Set with a cotton top, shorts and sun hat. Jersey top with short frilled sleeves, an opening with a button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Shorts with an elasticated waist. Sun hat with narrow ties and a cotton lining.
5-pocket jeans in soft stretch denim with worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist with a button and a fake fly.
Short, wrapover skirt in imitation leather with concealed elastication at the waist, a visible zip at the back and decorative gathers at one side.
Long-sleeved tops in soft organic cotton jersey with frills over the shoulders.
Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, welt back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Tailored trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, and side and back pockets. Straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with creases.

Fitted top in jersey with a transparent mesh yoke and sleeves, and a cut-out opening at the top.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Cap in patterned cotton twill with a sewn-on bow at the top and elastication at the back.
Set with a sun hat and triangular scarf in patterned cotton. Sun hat with ties under the chin. Lined. Double-layered, triangular scarf with an adjustable press-stud fastening.
Cotton hairbands in different designs. One in woven fabric with elastication at the back. One in jersey with a bow at the front.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem.
